name: PoliteSpanish
0:
”Alexa, open Polite Spanish”
”Alexa, start Polite Spanish”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: polite spanish
des: Use this skill to learn a short set of the most useful words and phrases to help you to be polite in Spanish. You can learn all of the phrases in a few minutes, then review for a few days in preparation for your trip to a Spanish speaking country. This skill is designed for English-speaking people to quickly learn basic vocabulary to use in most social and professional situations. While learning a new language is hard, showing even a minor effort to speak in the native language is often appreciated. This Alexa Skill can be used in either of two modes: 'Review' to learn the phrases; and 'Test' to quiz yourself on the phrases.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
